languages.text: {n}Заметив кибермастифа, ваша копия расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "Привет, Глейто! В моем мире у тебя шрамов поменьше, наверное, потому что я убедил{mf||а} твоего хозяина оставить службу в Арбитес. Со мной хоть тоже опасно бывает, но я всегда готов{mf||а} вас прикрыть".

{n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив кибермастифа, ваша копия расплывается в улыбке.{/n} "Привет, Глейто! В моем мире у тебя шрамов поменьше, наверное, потому что я убедил{mf||а} твоего хозяина оставить службу в Арбитес. Со мной хоть тоже опасно бывает, но я всегда готов{mf||а} вас прикрыть".

You do not have as many scars in my world — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."

languages.text: {n}你的复制人看到格雷托时，脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“你好啊，格雷托！在我所在的世界里，你身上没有这么多伤疤，可能是因为我说服你的主人离开了法务部吧。与我同行或许一样很危险，但至少，我永远都会照顾你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的复制人看到格雷托时，脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“你好啊，格雷托！在我所在的世界里，你身上没有这么多伤疤，可能是因为我说服你的主人离开了法务部吧。与我同行或许一样很危险，但至少，我永远都会照顾你。”
{n}你的复制人看到格雷托时，脸上露出了笑容。{/n}“你好啊，格雷托！在我所在的世界里，你身上没有这么多伤疤，可能是因为我说服你的主人离开了法务部吧。与我同行或许一样很危险，但至少，我永远都会照顾你。”

languages.text: {n}Tu copia sonríe al ver al cibermastín.{/n} «¡Hola, Glaito! En mi realidad tienes menos cicatrices, probablemente porque convencí a tu amo de que dejara el Arbites. Viajar conmigo también es peligroso, pero por lo menos siempre cuido de ti».
languages.original_text: {n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu copia sonríe al ver al cibermastín.{/n} «¡Hola, Glaito! En mi realidad tienes menos cicatrices, probablemente porque convencí a tu amo de que dejara el Arbites. Viajar conmigo también es peligroso, pero por lo menos siempre cuido de ti».

languages.text: {n}Votre sosie sourit en remarquant le cyber-mastiff.{/n} « Bonjour, Glaito. Tu n'as pas autant de cicatrices dans ma réalité. Peut-être parce que j'ai réussi à convaincre ton maître de quitter l'Arbites. Voyager à mes côtés peut être dangereux, mais au moins, je suis toujours là pour te protéger. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre sosie sourit en remarquant le cyber-mastiff.{/n} « Bonjour, Glaito. Tu n'as pas autant de cicatrices dans ma réalité. Peut-être parce que j'ai réussi à convaincre ton maître de quitter l'Arbites. Voyager à mes côtés peut être dangereux, mais au moins, je suis toujours là pour te protéger. »

languages.text: {n}あなたのコピーはサイバーマスチフに気づいて微笑んだ。{/n}「こんにちは、グライト！私の現実ではあなたの傷はそれほど多くないね。おそらく、それは私があなたの主人を高等裁定局の奉仕から離れるよう説得したからだろう。私と旅をするのも危険なことだけど、少なくとも私はいつもあなたの背中を守っているよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのコピーはサイバーマスチフに気づいて微笑んだ。{/n}「こんにちは、グライト！私の現実ではあなたの傷はそれほど多くないね。おそらく、それは私があなたの主人を高等裁定局の奉仕から離れるよう説得したからだろう。私と旅をするのも危険なことだけど、少なくとも私はいつもあなたの背中を守っているよ」

languages.text: {n}Kopyan, siber mastifi fark edince gülümsüyor.{/n} "Selam Glaito! Benim gerçekliğimde bu kadar yaran yok, belki de efendini Arbites mensuplarının hizmetinden ayrılmaya ikna ettiğim içindir. Benimle seyahat etmek de tehlikeli olabilir ama en azından her zaman arkandayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kopyan, siber mastifi fark edince gülümsüyor.{/n} "Selam Glaito! Benim gerçekliğimde bu kadar yaran yok, belki de efendini Arbites mensuplarının hizmetinden ayrılmaya ikna ettiğim içindir. Benimle seyahat etmek de tehlikeli olabilir ama en azından her zaman arkandayım."

languages.text: {n}Deine Kopie lächelt, als sie den Cyber-Mastiff bemerkt.{/n} "Hallo, Glaito! In meiner Realität hast du nicht so viele Narben – vielleicht, weil ich deinen Herren überzeugt habe, seinen Dienst bei den Arbites zu quittieren. Reisen mit mir können zwar auch gefährlich sein, aber ich halte dir wenigstens immer den Rücken frei."
languages.original_text: {n}Your copy smiles upon noticing the cyber-mastiff.{/n} "Hello, Glaito! You do not have as many scars in my reality — perhaps that is because I convinced your master to leave his service in the Arbites. Travelling with me can be dangerous too, but at least I always have your back."
